fw.name: GeometricOperators
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATConfusionPtOnCrvPtOnCrv
class.abstract: Class defining the operator testing the overlap of two points on a CATCurve.

method.name: GetConfusion
method.abstract: Returns the result of <tt>this</tt> CATConfusionPtOnCrvPtOnCrv operator.

class.name: CATConfusionPtOnSurPtOnSur
class.abstract: Class defining the operator testing the overlap of two points on a CATSurface.

method.name: GetConfusion
method.abstract: Returns the result of <tt>this</tt> CATConfusionPtOnSurPtOnSur operator.

class.name: CATConvertCurveToCanonic
class.abstract: Class representing the geometric operator to compute the most approaching canonical curve of a given curve.

method.name: GetPResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the created canonical curve, as a CATPCurve.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the created canonical curve.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetRecognitionMode
method.abstract: Defines the recognition mode.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance to fit the input curve, in case of approximated recognition mode.

class.name: CATCurveCurvilinearParameterization
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to parameterize a curve in curvilinear parameterization.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Retrieves the curve limits.

class.name: CATCurveUserParameterization
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to parameterize a curve with a general parameterization.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Retrieves the curve limits.

class.name: CATDistanceMinCrvCrv
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of the minimum distance between two curves.

method.name: GetCurveParam
method.abstract: Returns a parameter on a given curve realizing the minimum distance between the two input CATCurves.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the minimum distance between two CATCurves.

method.name: GetPointOnCurve
method.abstract: Creates a CATPointOnCurve realizing the minimum distance between two CATCurves.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Defines the curve domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> operator in case of <tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode.

class.name: CATDistanceMinPtCrv
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of the minimum distance between a point and a curve.

method.name: GetCrvParam
method.abstract: Returns the global parameter of the point realizing the minimum distance.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the minimum distance between a curve and a point.

method.name: GetPointOnCurve
method.abstract: Creates a CATPointCnCurve realizing the minimum distance.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Defines the new domain of the curve to take into account for <tt>this</tt> operator in <tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode.

method.name: SetPoint
method.abstract: Sets the new point from which the main distance with the curve is computed.

class.name: CATDistanceMinPtSur
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of the minimum distance between a point and a surface.

method.name: GetDiagnostic
method.abstract: In the case of SetPointAndInit usage, the algorithm is limited to a maximum number of iterations.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the minimum distance between a surface and a point.

method.name: GetPointOnSurface
method.abstract: Creates a CATPointOnSurface realizing the minimum distance between a surface and a point.

method.name: GetSurParam
method.abstract: Returns the parameter of a point realizing the minimum distance between a surface and a point.

method.name: IsASolution
method.abstract: Tests whether a solution exists in case of an excluded boundary seach (<tt>iSearchOnBoundary=FALSE</tt>).

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Defines the new domain of the surface to take into account for <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetPoint
method.abstract: Sets a new point from which the distance to the same surface is evaluated (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetPoint
method.abstract: Sets a new point from which the distance to the same surface is evaluated (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetPointAndInit
method.abstract: Sets a new point and an initialization (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetPointAndInit
method.abstract: Sets a new point and an initialization (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetSearchOnBoundary
method.abstract: Defines whether the boundaries are taken into account or not (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATDistanceTool
class.abstract: Class defining the type of parallel computation and is to be used when you want to create a parallel curve onto a support.

method.name: GetCompositeLaw
method.abstract: Returns the law used to compute the distance.

method.name: GetSide
method.abstract: Returns the side on which the parallel is computed.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the type of parallelism.

class.name: CATDynMassProperties1D
class.abstract: Class defining the geometric operator to perform a global analysis on a CATCurve.

method.name: GetLength
method.abstract: Returns the total length of a CATCurve.

method.name: GetLengthFromParams
method.abstract: Returns the length between two points of a CATCurve.

method.name: GetParamFromLength
method.abstract: Returns the CATCrvParam corresponding to the point at a given length of another point.

class.name: CATEdgeCurveComputation
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to create the edge curve representing two curves.

method.name: GetEdgeCurve
method.abstract: Returns the created edge curve.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Defines the domains of the curves to take into account (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetMaxGap
method.abstract: Defines the maximum gap between the initial curves above which the edge curve cannot be created (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetParams
method.abstract: Defines the domains of the curves to take into account (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

class.name: CATGeoOperator
class.abstract: Base class for the geometric operators.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATInclusionPtCrv
class.abstract: Class defining the operator for testing the inclusion of a point in a curve.

method.name: BeginningPoint
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting points of <tt>this</tt> CATInclusionPtCrv operator.

method.name: GetCurveParam
method.abstract: Retrieves the parameter of the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATInclusionPtCrv operator.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the distance of a solution point and the curve.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of resulting points of <tt>this</tt> CATInclusionPtCrv operator.

method.name: GetPointOnCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATInclusionPtCrv operator.

method.name: NextPoint
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATInclusionPtCrv operator.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the curve domain to take into account (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATInclusionPtSur
class.abstract: Class defining the operator for testing the inclusion of a point in a surface.

method.name: BeginningPoint
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting points of <tt>this</tt> CATInclusionPtSur operator.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the distance of a solution point and the surface.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of resulting points of <tt>this</tt> CATInclusionPtCrv operator.

method.name: GetPointOnSurface
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATInclusionPtSur operator.

method.name: GetSignature
method.abstract: Returns the signature of the solution point.

method.name: GetSurParam
method.abstract: Retrieves the parameter of the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATInclusionPtSur operator.

method.name: NextPoint
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATInclusionPtSur operator.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Defines the curve new limitations to take into account for <tt>this</tt> operator in <tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode.

method.name: SetPoint
method.abstract: Sets a new point for <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetPoint
method.abstract: Sets a new point for <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATIntersectionCrvCrv
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of the intersection of two curves.

method.name: BeginningCurve
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the solution curves.

method.name: BeginningPoint
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting points.

method.name: GetCartesianPoint
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvCrv operator.

method.name: GetCurveLimits
method.abstract: Returns the domain of the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvCrv operator.

method.name: GetCurveParam
method.abstract: Retrieves the parameter of the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvCrv operator.

method.name: GetEdgeCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvCrv operator as an edge curve.

method.name: GetNumberOfCurves
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution curves of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvCrv operator.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of isolated resulting points of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvCrv operator.

method.name: GetPointOnCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point on curve of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvCrv operator.

method.name: NextCurve
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvCrv operator.

method.name: NextPoint
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvCrv operator.

method.name: SetCurve
method.abstract: Defines the intersection with another second curve (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: UseLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the curve domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvCrv operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATIntersectionCrvSur
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of the intersection of a curve and a surface.

method.name: BeginningCurve
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the solution curves of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: BeginningPoint
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting points.

method.name: GetCartesianPoint
method.abstract: Createss the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetCurveBoundaries
method.abstract: Returns the domain of the next resulting curve of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetCurveParam
method.abstract: Returns the parameter on the curve of the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetEdgeCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve as an edge curve.

method.name: GetNumberOfCurves
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution curves of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of isolated solution points of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetPCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetPointOnCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point on curve of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetPointOnSurface
method.abstract: Returns the next solution point on surface of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetSignatureOn
method.abstract: Returns the relative orientation of the curve tangent and the surface normal at the intersection point.

method.name: GetSurfaceParam
method.abstract: Returns the parameter on the surface of the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: NextCurve
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: NextPoint
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: SetCurve
method.abstract: Defines the intersection with another curve (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the curve domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the surface domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetSurface
method.abstract: Defines the intersection with another second surface (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATIntersectionSurSur
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of the intersection of two surfaces.

method.name: BeginningCurve
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the solution curves of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionSurSur operator.

method.name: BeginningPoint
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting points.

method.name: BeginningSurface
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the solution surfaces.

method.name: GetCartesianPoint
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionSurSur operator.

method.name: GetCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionSurSur operator.

method.name: GetEdgeCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve as an edge curve.

method.name: GetEdgeCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve as an edge curve.

method.name: GetNumberOfCurves
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution curves.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution points.

method.name: GetNumberOfSurfaces
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution surfaces.

method.name: GetPCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve as a CATPCurve pointer.

method.name: GetPCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionSurSur operator.

method.name: GetPointOnSurface
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point on a surface of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionSurSur operator.

method.name: GetSignatureOn
method.abstract: Returns the signature of the intersection edge with regards to the surface normals.

method.name: GetSurParam
method.abstract: Retrieves the parameters on each surface of the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionSurSur operator.

method.name: GetSurfaceBoundaries
method.abstract: Returns the boundaries of the next solution surface.

method.name: GetSurfaceBoundaries
method.abstract: Returns the boundaries of the next solution surface.

method.name: NextCurve
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionSurSur operator.

method.name: NextPoint
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionSurSur operator.

method.name: NextSurface
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution surface of <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionSurSur operator.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the surface domains to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionSurSur operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATLocalAnalysis1D
class.abstract: Class defining the local analysis on a point of a CATCurve.

constructor.name: CATLocalAnalysis1D
constructor.abstract: Creates a local analyzer on a point of a CATCurve.

constructor.name: CATLocalAnalysis1D
constructor.abstract: Creates a local analyzer on a point of a CATCurve.

method.name: GetBiNormal
method.abstract: Returns the binormal at the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis1D.

method.name: GetCurvature
method.abstract: Returns the curvature at the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis1D.

method.name: GetMainNormal
method.abstract: Returns the main normal at the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis1D.

method.name: GetTorsion
method.abstract: Returns the torsion at the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis1D.

method.name: IsARegularParam
method.abstract: Tests whether the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis1D is regular.

method.name: SetParam
method.abstract: Modifies the point where <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis1D is performed.

method.name: operator=
method.abstract: Assignment operator.

class.name: CATLocalAnalysis2D
class.abstract: Class defining the local analysis on a point of a CATSurface.

constructor.name: CATLocalAnalysis2D
constructor.abstract: Creates a local analyzer on a point of a CATSurface.

constructor.name: CATLocalAnalysis2D
constructor.abstract: Creates a local analyzer on a point of a CATSurface.

method.name: GetCurvatureAlongDirection
method.abstract: Returns the curvature along a direction of the surface.

method.name: GetFirstFundamentalForm
method.abstract: Retrieves the first fondamental form at the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis2D.

method.name: GetGaussianCurvature
method.abstract: Returns the gaussian curvature at the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis2D.

method.name: GetMeanCurvature
method.abstract: Returns the mean curvature at the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis2D.

method.name: GetMinMaxCurvature
method.abstract: Returns the min and max curvatures at the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis2D.

method.name: GetMinMaxCurvaturesAndDirections
method.abstract: Returns the min and max curvatures at the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis2D, along with the associated principal curvature directions.

method.name: GetSecondFundamentalForm
method.abstract: Retrieves the second fondamental form at the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis2D.

method.name: IsARegularParam
method.abstract: Tests whether the point of <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis2D is regular.

method.name: ProjectVector
method.abstract: Returns the 2D coordinates of the projection of the 3d vector <tt>iVector</tt> on the surface.

method.name: SetParam
method.abstract: Modifies the point where <tt>this</tt> CATLocalAnalysis2D is performed.

method.name: operator=
method.abstract: Assignment operator.

class.name: CATMathNurbsCurveTools
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that creates a set of C2 Nurbs curves.

method.name: ConvertToC2NurbsCurves
method.abstract: Creates a set of Nurbs curves from a CATMathNurbsCurveTools, the resulting curves are at least C2.

method.name: ConvertToC2PNurbs
method.abstract: Creates a set of PNurbs curves from a CATMathNurbsCurveTools, the resulting curves are at least C2.

method.name: GetGlobalEquation
method.abstract: Retrieves the mathematical equation associated with <tt>this</tt> CATMathNurbsCurveTools.

class.name: CATMathNurbsSurfaceTools
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that creates a set of C2 Nurbs surfaces.

method.name: ConvertToC2NurbsSurfaces
method.abstract: Creates a set of Nurbs surfaces from a CATMathNurbsSurfaceTools, the resulting surfaces are at least C2.

method.name: GetGlobalEquation
method.abstract: Retrieves the mathematical equation associated with <tt>this</tt> CATMathNurbsSurfaceTools.

class.name: CATNurbsCurveTools
class.abstract: Class used to manipulate a Nurbs curve.

method.name: ActiveSplit
method.abstract: Splits the curve.

method.name: ChangeKnotVector
method.abstract: Modifies the knot vector of a curve.

method.name: Check
method.abstract: Checks the current curve.

method.name: GetDeformation
method.abstract: Computes an estimation of the deformation value.

method.name: GetDegree
method.abstract: Retrieves the curve degree.

method.name: GetInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the CATNurbsToolsInfo.

method.name: GetNumberOfControlPoints
method.abstract: Retrieves the number of control points of the Nurbs curve.

method.name: GetNumberOfKnots
method.abstract: Retrieves the number of knot values of the Nurbs curve.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the new curve computed by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: ImposeParametrization
method.abstract: Imposes the parameterization of another curve.

method.name: Invert
method.abstract: Inverts the curve.

method.name: KnotInsertion
method.abstract: Inserts a knot.

method.name: KnotRankToKnotValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a knot value from its rank.

method.name: KnotRemoval
method.abstract: Removes a knot.

method.name: KnotReplace
method.abstract: Replaces a knot.

method.name: KnotValueToKnotRank
method.abstract: Retrieves the rank of a knot from its value.

method.name: MultipleKnotInsertion
method.abstract: Inserts several knots.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetDegree
method.abstract: Modifies the curve degree.

method.name: SetMultiplicity
method.abstract: Modifies the multiplicity of a knot.

class.name: CATNurbsSurfaceTools
class.abstract: Class used to manipulate a Nurbs surface.

method.name: ActiveSplits
method.abstract: Splits the surface.

method.name: Check
method.abstract: Checks the current surface.

method.name: ExchangeUV
method.abstract: Reverses U and V along the surface.

method.name: GetDeformation
method.abstract: Computes an estimation of the deformation value.

method.name: GetDegrees
method.abstract: Retrieves the surface degree.

method.name: GetInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the CATNurbsToolsInfo.

method.name: GetNumberOfControlPoints
method.abstract: Retrieves the number of control points of the Nurbs surface.

method.name: GetNumberOfKnots
method.abstract: Retrieves the number of knot values of the Nurbs surface.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the new surface computed by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: ImposeParametrizations
method.abstract: Imposes the parameterization of another surface This method deforms the surface.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetDegrees
method.abstract: Mofifies the degree of the surface.

method.name: UActiveSplit
method.abstract: Splits the surface along U.

method.name: UChangeKnotVector
method.abstract: Modifies the knot vector along U.

method.name: UImposeParametrization
method.abstract: Imposes the parameterization of a surface along U.

method.name: UInvert
method.abstract: Inverts the surface along U.

method.name: UKnotInsertion
method.abstract: Inserts a knot along U.

method.name: UKnotRankToKnotValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a knot value along U from its rank.

method.name: UKnotRemoval
method.abstract: Removes a knot along U.

method.name: UKnotReplace
method.abstract: Replaces a knot along U.

method.name: UKnotValueToKnotRank
method.abstract: Retrieves the rank of a knot along U from its value.

method.name: UMultipleKnotInsertion
method.abstract: Inserts several knots along U.

method.name: USetDegree
method.abstract: Modifies the degree of the surface along U.

method.name: USetMultiplicity
method.abstract: Modifies the multiplicity of a knot along U.

method.name: VActiveSplit
method.abstract: Splits the surface along V.

method.name: VChangeKnotVector
method.abstract: Modifies the knot vector along U.

method.name: VImposeParametrization
method.abstract: Imposes the parameterization of a surface along V.

method.name: VInvert
method.abstract: Inverts the surface along V.

method.name: VKnotInsertion
method.abstract: Inserts a knot along V.

method.name: VKnotRankToKnotValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a knot value along V from its rank.

method.name: VKnotRemoval
method.abstract: Removes a knot along V.

method.name: VKnotReplace
method.abstract: Replaces a knot along V.

method.name: VKnotValueToKnotRank
method.abstract: Retrieves the rank of a knot along V from its value.

method.name: VMultipleKnotInsertion
method.abstract: Inserts several knots along V.

method.name: VSetDegree
method.abstract: Modifies the degree of the surface along V.

method.name: VSetMultiplicity
method.abstract: Modifies the multiplicity of a knot along V.

class.name: CATProjectionCrvSur
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of projection of a CATCurve onto a CATSurface.

method.name: BeginningCurve
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the solution curves of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: BeginningPoint
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting points.

method.name: GetCartesianPoint
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the maximum orthogonal distance between the CATCurve and the CATSurface.

method.name: GetLimitsOnCurve
method.abstract: Maps the limitations of the next solution curve on the original curve.

method.name: GetLimitsOnCurve
method.abstract: Maps the limitations of the next solution curve on the original curve.

method.name: GetLimitsOnProjection
method.abstract: Retrieves the limitations of the next resulting curve.

method.name: GetLimitsOnProjection
method.abstract: Retrieves the limitations of the next resulting curve.

method.name: GetLimitsOnSurface
method.abstract: Retrieves the limits of the next resulting curve on the surface.

method.name: GetMappingParam
method.abstract: Maps a parameter on the curve to project to a parameter on the projection.

method.name: GetNumberOfCurves
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution curves resulting of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution points of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetPCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve as a curve on surface.

method.name: GetPointOnSurface
method.abstract: Creates the next solution as a point on surface.

method.name: IsComplete
method.abstract: Tests whether the curve is entirely projected.

method.name: IsCompletelyOnSurface
method.abstract: Tests whether the curve is entirely lying on the surfae.

method.name: IsPartial
method.abstract: Tests whether the curve is partially projected.

method.name: IsPartiallyOnSurface
method.abstract: Tests whether the curve is partially lying on the surfae.

method.name: NextCurve
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: NextPoint
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: SetClosestProjection
method.abstract: Asks for the closest projection solution (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetCurve
method.abstract: Asks for the projection of a new CATCurve (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetCuspCut
method.abstract: Asks for cusp cut setting (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetLayDown
method.abstract: Sets the "LayDown" mode.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the curve domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the surface domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetMaximalDistance
method.abstract: Set the maximal distance between a pint and its projected (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetNoClosedProjection
method.abstract: sks for the projection solution not closed (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetSurface
method.abstract: Asks for the projection on a new CATSurface (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: UnSetClosestProjection
method.abstract: Asks for the all the solutions (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATProjectionPtCrv
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of projection of a CATPoint onto a CATCurve.

method.name: BeginningPoint
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting points.

method.name: GetCartesianPoint
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionPtCrv operator.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the maximum orthogonal distance between the CATCurve and the CATPoint.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution points of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionPtCrv operator.

method.name: GetParam
method.abstract: Returns the parameter on the curve of the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionPtCrv operator.

method.name: GetPointOnCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution as a point on curve of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionPtCrv operator.

method.name: NextPoint
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionPtCrv operator.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the curve domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATIntersectionCrvSur operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetPoint
method.abstract: Defines a new point to project (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATProjectionPtSur
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of projection of a CATPoint onto a CATSurface.

method.name: BeginningPoint
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting points.

method.name: GetCartesianPoint
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionPtSur operator.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the distance between the CATPoint and its Projection on the CATSurface.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution points of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionPtSur operator.

method.name: GetParam
method.abstract: Returns the parameter on the surface of the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionPtSur operator.

method.name: GetPointOnSurface
method.abstract: Creates the next solution as a point on surface.

method.name: NextPoint
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionPtSur operator.

method.name: SetPoint
method.abstract: Defines a new point to project (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: UseLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the surface domain to be taken into account for <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionPtSur operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATReflectCurve
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to compute the reflect curves on a surface.

method.name: BeginningCurve
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the solution curves of <tt>this</tt> CATProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve.

method.name: GetNumberOfPCurves
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution curves.

method.name: GetPCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve as a curve on surface.

method.name: NextCurve
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATReflectCurve operator.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the surface domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATReflectCurve operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATSurTo2DGlobalMapping
class.abstract: Class defining a consistant global mapping between a set of CATSurface and a virtual 2 dimension space.

class.name: CATSurTo2DGlobalPlanarMapping
class.abstract: Class defining the mapping between one set of surfaces and a virtual 2 dimension space defined by an axis.

function.name: CATConcatenateNurbsCurves
function.abstract: Computes the data required for the C0-concatenation of a list of Nurbs curves.

function.name: CATConcatenateNurbsSurfaces
function.abstract: Computes the data required for the C0-concatenation of a list of Nurbs curves.

function.name: CATCreateConfusion
function.abstract: Creates an operator for testing the overlap of two CATPointOnSurfaces, with respect to the geodesical length between the points.

function.name: CATCreateConfusion
function.abstract: Creates an operator for testing the overlap of two CATPointOnCurves.

function.name: CATCreateConfusion
function.abstract: Creates an operator for testing the overlap of two CATPointOnSurfaces, with respect to the Geodesical length between the points.

function.name: CATCreateConvertCurveToCanonic
function.abstract: Creates an operator that computes the most approaching canonical curve of a given curve.

function.name: CATCreateConvertCurveToCanonic
function.abstract: Creates an operator that computes the most approaching canonical curve of a set of curves lying on the same plane.

function.name: CATCreateConvertCurveToCanonic
function.abstract: Creates an operator that computes the most approaching canonical curve of a given edge curve.

function.name: CATCreateCurveCurvilinearParameterization
function.abstract: Creates a CATCurveCurvilinearParameterization operator.

function.name: CATCreateCurveUserParameterization
function.abstract: Creates a CATCurveUserParameterization operator.

function.name: CATCreateDistanceMin
function.abstract: Creates an operator for computing the minimum distance between a CATPoint and a CATCurve.

function.name: CATCreateDistanceMin
function.abstract: Creates an operator for computing the minimum distance between two curves.

function.name: CATCreateDistanceMin
function.abstract: Creates an operator for computing the minimum distance between a CATMathPoint and a CATCurve.

function.name: CATCreateDistanceMinLim
function.abstract: Creates an operator for computing the minimum distance between a CATPoint and a CATSurface.

function.name: CATCreateDistanceMinLim
function.abstract: Creates an operator for computing the minimum distance between a CATMathPoint and a CATSurface.

function.name: CATCreateEdgeCurveComputation
function.abstract: Creates an operator to compute an edge curve.

function.name: CATCreateInclusion
function.abstract: Creates an operator for testing the inclusion of a CATPoint in a CATCurve.

function.name: CATCreateInclusion
function.abstract: Creates an operator for testing the inclusion of a CATPoint in a CATSurface.

function.name: CATCreateInclusion
function.abstract: Creates an operator for testing the inclusion of a CATMathPoint in a CATSurface.

function.name: CATCreateIntersection
function.abstract: Creates an operator intersecting two curves.

function.name: CATCreateIntersection
function.abstract: Creates an operator intersecting a curve and a surface.

function.name: CATCreateIntersection
function.abstract: Creates an operator intersecting two surfaces.

function.name: CATCreateLocalAnalysis
function.abstract: Creates a local analyzer by copy.

function.name: CATCreateLocalAnalysis
function.abstract: Creates a local analyzer by copy.

function.name: CATCreateLocalAnalysis
function.abstract: Creates a local analyzer on a point of a CATCurve.

function.name: CATCreateLocalAnalysis
function.abstract: Creates a local analyzer on a point of a CATSurface.

function.name: CATCreateMathNurbsCurveTools
function.abstract: Creates an operator for dividing a Nurbs curve into several C2 Nurbs curves.

function.name: CATCreateMathNurbsSurfaceTools
function.abstract: Creates an operator for dividing a Nurbs surface into several C2 Nurbs surfaces.

function.name: CATCreateNurbsCurveTools
function.abstract: Creates an operator to manipulate a Nurbs curve.

function.name: CATCreateNurbsSurfaceTools
function.abstract: Creates an operator to manipulate a Nurbs Surface.

function.name: CATCreatePlanarMapping
function.abstract: Creates an object defining a global mapping between a plane and a 2D space.

function.name: CATCreateProjection
function.abstract: Creates an operator for projecting a CATPoint onto a CATCurve.

function.name: CATCreateProjection
function.abstract: Creates an operator for projecting a CATPoint onto a CATSurface.

function.name: CATCreateProjection
function.abstract: Creates an operator for projecting a CATCurve onto a CATSurface.

function.name: CATCreateReflectCurve
function.abstract: Creates an operator for the computation of the reflect curves.

function.name: CATDynCreateMassProperties1D
function.abstract: Creates a global analyzer on a CATCurve.

function.name: CreatePlanarMapping
function.abstract: Creates an object defining a global mapping between a plane and a 2D space.
